# Latin

code: la
wiktionary: en
direction: ltr

---

## Sentence Delimiters

.
!
?

---

## POS Categories

verb | Verb
noun | Noun
adj | Adjective
adv | Adverb
prep | Preposition
conj | Conjunction
pron | Pronoun
other | Other

---

## Morphological Categories

### verb
tense: pres, impf, fut, perf, plup, futperf, inf, ptcp
voice: act, pass
mood: ind, subj, imp
person: 1sg, 2sg, 3sg, 1pl, 2pl, 3pl

### noun
case: nom, gen, dat, acc, abl, voc
number: sg, pl

### adj
degree: pos, comp, sup
case: nom, gen, dat, acc, abl, voc
gender: m, f, n
number: sg, pl

### adv
degree: pos, comp, sup

### pron
case: nom, gen, dat, acc, abl
gender: m, f, n
number: sg, pl

### prep
form: base

### conj
form: base

### other
form: base

---
